channel.title: docker-compose on devopstales
channel.description: Recent content in docker-compose on devopstales

item.title: Openshift: Run docker-compoe in Openshift
item.description: Kompose is a open source tool that uses “docker-compose” file to deploy on kubernetes. Openshift is also Kubernetes based and Kompose is support Openshift too.

item.title: Install AWX in docker
item.description: AWX is an open source web application that provides a user interface, REST API, and task engine for Ansible.
